Los Angeles ADU Permits

ADUs are popular for adding housing and income potential. Permits confirm zoning, structure, energy, and life-safety requirements. Monitoring ADU filings helps builders, lenders, and suppliers time outreach and forecast demand. Use the CSV link below to scan active projects by value and scope; add your keywords (e.g., “garage conversion”, “JADU”) on the Free CSV page for custom exports.
